direct_answer.text:
To solve this problem, we first add the whole numbers and then combine the decimal parts. Here's how it looks:
$$\begin{align*}
&\phantom{+}313\\
&+12\\
&=325 \\
\end{align*}$$
Now we move onto the decimal part:
$$\begin{align*}
&\phantom{+}325\\
&+\phantom{0.}6\\
&=325.6
\end{align*}$$
So when you add 313.9 to 12.6, you get 326.5. Thus, our final answer written out fully is $$\boxed{326.5}$$.
